Responsive HTML Email Template

Built with tables and inline styles for maximum compatibility. Includes a CTA button and a 2-column section that collapses on mobile.

View the template

Email-safe layout

Tables, inline styles, and conservative patterns that work across Gmail, Outlook, and Apple Mail.

Mobile responsive

Simple media queries switch columns to full-width blocks for small screens.

Tip: Always test in Gmail + Outlook. Email rendering is different from web rendering.
